General.Name: THC Biomed Intl Ltd
General.Description: THC Biomed Intl Ltd. produces and sells medical and recreational cannabis in Canada. It offers cannabis beverage shots, gummies, and biscuits under the THC KISS brand names, as well as pure cannabis sticks. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 2550 Acland Road, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1X 7L4
